hero.title: Modern Astro Starter Template
hero.subtitle: A powerful starter template for Astro with Server-Side Rendering (SSR), ready-to-use Redis caching, and a Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) architecture.

usage.title: Create a New Project
usage.description: To create a new project based on this template, run the following command in your terminal:

features.title: Astro SSR
features.description: Configured for server-side rendering for maximum performance and SEO.

features.title: Backend-for-Frontend (BFF)
features.description: A secure pattern for working with APIs that protects your keys and simplifies logic.

features.title: Redis Caching
features.description: Ready-to-use Redis integration for production-level data caching.

features.title: Tailwind CSS
features.description: A modern utility-first CSS framework and a library of ready-made UI components.

features.title: Localization Ready
features.description: The project structure is ready for internationalization and multi-language support.

features.title: TypeScript
features.description: Strong typing for reliable and scalable code.

demo.title: API & Caching Demo
demo.description: Click the buttons below to make a request to our BFF API route. The cache status will be shown below.
demo.result_placeholder: The request result will appear here...

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Start building your next project with our modern Astro starter template.
